name: swfft

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
A stand-alone version of HACC's distributed-memory, pencil-decomposed,
parallel 3D FFT.

dependencies.name: fftw
dependencies.description:
FFTW is a C subroutine library for computing the discrete Fourier
transform (DFT) in one or more dimensions, of arbitrary input size, and
of both real and complex data (as well as of even/odd data, i.e. the
discrete cosine/sine transforms or DCT/DST). We believe that FFTW, which
is free software, should become the FFT library of choice for most
applications.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description:
MVAPICH2-X is the advanced version of the MVAPICH2 MPI library with
enhanced features (UMR, ODP, DC, Core-Direct, SHARP, XPMEM), OSU INAM
(InifniBand Network Monitoring and Analysis),PGAS (OpenSHMEM, UPC,
UPC++, and CAF), and MPI+PGAS programming models with unified
communication runtime. MVAPICH2-X is not installable from source and is
only available through a binary mirror. If you do not find the binary
you're looking for, send us an email at mvapich@cse.ohio-state.edu. The
binary mirror url is: http://mvapich.cse.ohio-
state.edu/download/mvapich/spack-mirror/mvapich2x/

dependent_to.name: ecp-proxy-apps
dependent_to.description:
This is a collection of packages that represents the official suite of
DOE/ECP proxy applications. This is a Spack bundle package that installs
the ECP proxy application suite.
